text: Amy Schumer is now married! According to Us Weekly, the comedian tied the knot in a secret ceremony with her boyfriend, Chris Fischer, this week. The star - studded wedding apparently took place on February 13, right before Valentine's Day, at a rented house in Malibu. Us Weekly says that a ` ` comedian officiated the nuptials,'' and a slew of celebrity guests attended, including Jennifer Aniston, Jennifer Lawrence and Judd Apatow. Schumer shared several photos on Instagram, including this cute snap with Lawrence : Instagram According to The Blast, Jake Gyllenhaal was also there, and the reception apparently ` ` featured a huge seafood bar where guests dined on oysters.''
